text: Sure that is a good idea, I actually have just had my contract terminated, because of the virus, but I am sure I will be able to find someone who will be able to show you around for a day.  Keep well and contact me when you are ready.

Hello Mark,
I am sorry to hear. I see a lot of companies are closing the doors at the moment.
Stay well, I will contact you again once all this has passed.
Thank again for your advices
